Question & Options:
Which of the following accolades did the movie 'Kahaani' receive at the 14th Zee Cine Awards in 2012?
Options:
A. Best Film (Critics)
B. Best Director
C. Best Actress
D. Best Screenplay
Correct Answer: Best Film (Critics), Best Director, Best Actress, Best Screenplay

Question & Options:
Which of the following accolades were awarded to the movie 'Kahaani' in 2012?
Options:
A. Best Director
B. Most Entertaining Film of the Year
C. Best Actress
D. Best Screenplay
Correct Answer: Most Entertaining Film of the Year

Question & Options:
Which of the following accolades are associated with the movie 'Kahaani' released in 2012?
Options:
A. Nominated for Best Film at the 58th Filmfare Awards
B. Won Best Director at the 58th Filmfare Awards
C. Nominated for Best Actress at the 58th Filmfare Awards
D. Nominated for Best Screenplay at the 58th Filmfare Awards
Correct Answer: Nominated for Best Film at the 58th Filmfare Awards, Nominated for Best Actress at the 58th Filmfare Awards, Nominated for Best Screenplay at the 58th Filmfare Awards

Question & Options:
Which of the following accolades were awarded to Sujoy Ghosh for the movie 'Kahaani' at the 58th Filmfare Awards in 2012?
Options:
A. Best Director for Sujoy Ghosh
B. Best Actress for Vidya Balan
C. Best Story
D. Best Editing
Correct Answer: Best Director for Sujoy Ghosh, Best Actress for Vidya Balan

Question & Options:
Which of the following accolades did the movie 'Kahaani' (2012) receive for Vidya Balan's performance?
Options:
A. Best Actress at the 19th Colors Screen Awards
B. Best Director at the 19th Colors Screen Awards
C. Best Actress at the Filmfare Awards
D. Best Film at the National Film Awards
Correct Answer: Best Actress at the 19th Colors Screen Awards

Question & Options:
Which of the following accolades were awarded to Vidya Balan for her performance in the movie 'Kahaani' (2012)?
Options:
A. Best Actress (Critics) at the 14th Zee Cine Awards
B. Best Actress at the Filmfare Awards
C. Best Actress at the National Film Awards
D. Best Actress (Critics) at the Screen Awards
Correct Answer: Best Actress (Critics) at the 14th Zee Cine Awards

Question & Options:
Which accolades did Vidya Balan receive for her performance in the movie 'Kahaani' (2012)?
Options:
A. Best Actress in a Thriller or Action
B. Best Supporting Actress
C. Best Actress in a Leading Role
D. Best Actress at the Stardust Awards
Correct Answer: Best Actress in a Thriller or Action, Best Actress at the Stardust Awards

Question & Options:
Which of the following accolades are associated with the movie 'Kahaani' released in 2012?
Options:
A. Namrata Rao won Best Editing
B. Kahaani was nominated for Best Actress
C. Kahaani received the Best Film award
D. Kahaani won Best Editing at the 60th National Film Awards
Correct Answer: Namrata Rao won Best Editing, Kahaani won Best Editing at the 60th National Film Awards

Question & Options:
Which of the following accolades were associated with the movie 'Kahaani' released in 2012?
Options:
A. Nawazuddin Siddiqui received a Special Jury award
B. The film won Best Director at the National Film Awards
C. Kahaani was nominated for Best Film at the Filmfare Awards
D. Vidya Balan received the Best Actress award at the National Film Awards
Correct Answer: Nawazuddin Siddiqui received a Special Jury award, Vidya Balan received the Best Actress award at the National Film Awards
